title: ‚ÄòGod has chosen me to empower women,‚Äô says Modi as govt tables Women‚Äôs Reservation Bill in LS
selftext: ‚ÄúPerhaps God has chosen me for this sacred work, to empower women and harness their power. Once again, our government has taken steps in this direction,‚Äù he said.
comments: Self anointment soon after 24 elections
Jashoda ben agrees?
Yeah... please do something on rape crimes.. they are women not buffalos
sry  no can't do, , God did not say anything about that üòú
Modiji even Brij Bhushan's laughing .Aur please apna standup jokes weekend khe liye rakho na ..
He started empowering women when he left his wife and used his mother for political brownie points. Such empowerment, much appreciation.
The credit goes to **Perhaps God**.
Fucking insane amount of shamelessness my word hahahaha. This dude and his dogs are laughing at us Indians.
Somebody say manipur women ?

There are no women in Manipur?

No need to wait for self anointment. Some are already seeing him as god:

https://old.reddit.com/r/india/comments/16k7xvr/modiadani_love_affair_remark_supreme_court/
First Empowered Woman - His wife - jasodaben, whom he denied as wife and claimed himself as Bramhachari.
Women everywhere are vigilant. Women in India are hyper-vigilant. They see through these empty words far better than his male andh-bhakt following.
I thought he was the god
https://preview.redd.it/1gh2kfshs7pb1.jpeg?width=360&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=54df1781f6ecf0f2593b6b8d4bb13627cec539a2

His wife was empowered after he left her .... 

He is right god chose him to empower women
r/shitmodijisays
Crazy talk, but I guess womens reservation will finally become a reality.
Modi ji ki wife ka kay? Shaddi kar ke, nikaal liye Himalayas.
Lord Vishnu cosplay in next parliament session?
2024: God has chosen me to wear this golden crown.
Don't forget his blindness towards Manipur victims.
Fuckin shameless
Ahh, where did I hear this before?
Such a drama queen !!
Women wrestlers might be shedding tears of joy and thanking god./s
Kuki women who were protesting outside Amit Shah's residence say hi
Which means he thinks he has chosen himself.
While Manipur victims, Bilkis Bano etc watch in silence and tears.
This is certainly a sentence.
If only they were cows /s

100s of women were gangraped in the post Godhra riots while the CM played the fiddle. Wish God had chosen him then to empower women. 

One does pity the morons who believe this level of rando BS.
https://preview.redd.it/4zdbzi9be8pb1.jpeg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=97459f25d3ee2f7a41a7ff601fe5794a0ab54d0d
Words of wisdom by a person who planned early acquittal of rapists and mass murderers.
This guy is on some other high
A+ grade shameless hypocrite.

Do they? My best friend is a woman, she does not comment about this but still votes for them because Sitaraman is the best FM we have ever had and above all she is a woman.  If she was praising Sushma Swaraj I could at least accept it, but Sitaraman. My God.
What an egomaniac this man has become. All the bhakti from his bhakta gan has gone to head.
I read that as clown.
Just not Bilkis and the million other women who have been tormented by evil men and the government

I know it wont come into effect until 2029 etc etc‚Ä¶but this is indeed a positive step. The moment we have more women in the legislature, I expect the efficiency and sensibility of the lawmakers as a whole to receive a boost no matter what their party affiliations are.

I know it wont come into effect until 2029 etc etc‚Ä¶but this is indeed a positive step. The moment we have more women in the legislature, I expect the efficiency and sensibility of the lawmakers as a whole to receive a boost no matter what their party affiliations are.
SS Rajamouli taking notes for next movie dialogues

I, like others calling this move a bluff, don't understand why is a census needed for this? And they've said after delimitation as well, which is definitely going to be fought tooth and nail by the southern states
Kabhi kabhi lagta hai apunich bhagwan hai
Stupids have chosen you to drain India for Adani

Women's reservation though looks good not sure if it serves in purpose in India. 

Atleast with corporation elections, women's reservation exists. I am a Bangalorean and been in multiple wards with women corporators.
When seats get women's seat it's the wife of ex-corporator who contests, the labels on boards don't change, you never get to meet these women, it's their Husbands rule all the way.
Now it will be wives/daughters of ex-MPs.
More power to Jashodaben !

Jab chicha ne ghar walio ko he nahi chora to bahar wali ki kya izzat.
When he didn't spare his close one, how can you expect any empathy from him for unknowns.
Just make him a saint already.
At this rate he might end in mental asylum soon .

https://preview.redd.it/32n1lu5hk9pb1.jpeg?width=600&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=9f277617f98d87eb4438378070db70bd631bdb94

One of those empowered women by Modi
George W Bush?

Guest is like god, your parents are like God, modiji is like God.

Your parent who happens to be modiji is like God and happens to be a guest.

Even middle aged and elderly women have the chalta hai attitude. They don‚Äôt want to punish those in power for their blunders because ‚Äúthe other parties are just as bad‚Äù.  
No wonder Indians can‚Äôt even train their dogs. They give positive reinforcement to the government for doing substandard work instead of giving negative reinforcement by changing the elected government and demanding better standards
His wife also chose him as a husband. And still he abandoned her!!!

The man abandoned his wife and made his 90 year old mother stand in queue for a photo-op. 

He going to bring back manusmriti and sati!

There will always be anecdotal anomalies.

And there are of course a percentage of women who due to conditioning identify more with their superficial social groupings which makes them vote for the party.

However, the women who don‚Äôt vote for the party, whom the party is trying to influence with these moves, won‚Äôt fall for such tactics.
Start with financially compensating your wife for abandoning her.
He is very modiest about it.
Oh I see what you mean. No new people will be wooed. That I would agree with lol.
Come on. How much narcissistic one person can be?
yeh kaisa neech insaan hai. Apni hi chatte chatte thakta nahi.
Beti bachao beti patao
Of course god would choose a man to empower women.
Didn't somebody rape a cow in haryana or something , even cows aren't safe apparently
They‚Äôre sad, so Mudiji is doing his best to give them something to laugh about.
unfair to say he played fiddle. he got the rapists released!
She is though victim of Modi and her parents though. Mudi uncle was a kid when he got married off
Which god though?
Did he say that in English? If he spoke in Hindi, what was the Hindi statement?
